desc: FreshFeelin' Exfoliating Gloves transforms skin to perfection by cleaning dead skin and tanning on legs, body, arms and face for beautiful glo. Benefits of exfoliating is to improve healing for cheeky, glow, healthy skin. Hence use exfoliator gloves mitt to get rid of impurities. Silk exfoliating glove best for face.

layout.text: AN EXFOLIATING GLOVE DELIVERING CLEARER SKIN
Make 100% from nature. Gentle exfoliation for radiant and glowing skin
